CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (victim);Violation of Art. 6-1;Non pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , a NORP national , was born in DATE and lives in the village of GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant was seriously injured due to the fault of his teacher . As a result , he became an invalid .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the same court against the ORG , seeking compensation for his medical , hygienic , and food expenses , and for loss of income . CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant lodged a complaint with ORG ( the “ ORG ” ) against ORG for failure to enforce the judgment of DATE . It held that the judgment could not be enforced due to the lack of State budgetary allocations in respect of the ORG 's expenditure , for which ORG was not responsible .
